item.title: Hungarian Mushroom Soup
item.description: Original Equipment Large soup pot Ingredients 1 stick (8 Tbsp) butter 4 cups onions, chopped (~2-3 medium onions?) 2 lb mushrooms, sliced 1 serrano chili, thinly sliced (optional) salt, to taste cayenne powder, to taste 1 cup dry white wine 4 cups chicken or vegetable stock Herbs: 1 Tbsp dried dill 1 Tbsp minced fresh thyme leaves Substitute or add: rosemary, tarragon, fresh sage. If fresh, can also just include whole sprig and fish it out later 1 Tbsp paprika 1/4 cup soy sauce 2 cup whole milk 1/3 cup flour 1/2 cup sour cream (or yogurt) 1/4 cup lemon juice optional goat cheese or parmesan for flavor (1/4 cup?
